Name: Montgomery Slugger
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in January 2013 at Maison Premiere , Williamsburg, New York.
Nutrition: One serving of Montgomery Slugger contains 204 calories
